type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Set No Gravity

---


[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/set_no_gravity).

Sets whether the entity is affected by gravity or not.

Type ID: `apugli:set_no_gravity`

---

### Example
```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:set_no_gravity",
    "value": true
}
```
This action makes the entity unaffected by gravity.

## Set No Gravity

---


[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/set_no_gravity).

Sets whether the entity is affected by gravity or not.

Type ID: `apugli:set_no_gravity`

---

### Example
```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:set_no_gravity",
```

This action makes the entity unaffected by gravity.

value.description: The value to set the `NoGravity` flag to. If not set it'll change the value to the opposite of what it currently is.
value.markdownDescription: The value to set the `NoGravity` flag to. If not set it'll change the value to the opposite of what it currently is.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Set No Gravity (Entity Action Type) date: 2022-07-29

Set No Gravity

Entity Action Type.

Sets whether the entity is affected by gravity or not.

Type ID: apugli:set_no_gravity

Fields

Field Type Default Description
value Boolean optional The value to set the NoGravity flag to. If not set it'll change the value to the opposite of what it currently is.

Example

"entity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:set_no_gravity",
    "value": true
}

This action makes the entity unaffected by gravity.
